names.bio: Award-winning actress, Sarina Farhadi was born in Tehran, Iran. She is the daughter of Parisa Bakhtavar and Oscar-winning Iranian writer/director, Asghar Farhadi. She appeared in two film and a TV Series. She appeared in her father's Oscar-winning film "Jodaeiye Nader az Simin" and won Best Actress Silver Berlin Bear Shared with Sareh Bayat, Leila Hatami in 2011.
names.name: Sarina Farhadi
